lyrics:
"Shirt Off" lyrics DJ Drama & Gucci Mane Lyrics "Shirt Off" (feat. Frenchie And Whoo The Kid) [Chorus:] I take mha shirt off n all dha hoes stop breathin [x3] So Icy Entertainment Got dammit I'm freezin My shirt off (Burr) [x7] My Shirt off (whoosh)[x7] [Verse 1: Freachie] F-r-e-a-c-h-I-e I'm tatted up come find me A hundred thou so icy We we poppin bottles Showin thug love If you act up in the club Then you knoe we throwin hollows Wut it dew partna Get to close I spark yha Mha wrist inside the club is like a highlighted marker On beats I'm a monster So icy I sponser This mary jane got on the war like nina parker I'm bout to kall Wakka Tell him bring dha choppa(blat) Fuck Cee in the Dr He'll be screamin like the opera It's hot as hell I gotta take off mha shirt Mha car my gurls love to wear skirts Paint color look like dirt No shirts in dhat 08' Vert. [Chorus] [Verse 2: Whoo Dha Kid] Money doin sumphan to mha ego More money I see I'm getting tatted like amigo (yea) White girl say she kan sniff a brick a day I tell her eat dha cake eat dha cake Anna Mae Go Go Yhu betta clear the plate (yea) She said I think I'm dead (why) Kause I kant feel mha face (yea) And she think she gettin dolla's 4rm dha kid All she get is hard dick in she swallowin mha kids I knoe dey feelin me kause I'm movin like a "G" move N mha red in black skirt & her brand new prada matchin mha Evisu No wife beater so I'm showin off mha sleeveless Art so I'm a kall it goin wif the breezes [Chorus] [Verse 3:Gucci Mane] 6-1 deep No shirt no top (go) White chain bright lane Vvs white rocks [blow] I'm a work ov art mane I'll crush yoor ice game Thousand dolla's lite mane Need to rob a dice game Tatted like a white mane Party like a rock band Tha so icy bike game Makin lames tuck chains Got damn Gucci Mane Yhu done did that shit again Goin knee deep in the earth so that yhu kan have a chain My body wrote on like an essay But homie no Mexican So icy entertainment You kan write it on me mane In the center of the stage wif no tank top (no no) For dha block I'm showin every tattoo I got (yea) [Chorus] if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPod|iPad|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) { document.getElementById('azmxmbanner').style.display='block'; document.write('
'+ ''+ '
'); } Submit Corrections Writer(s): Xavier Dotson, Radric Davis AZLyrics G Gucci Mane Lyrics mixtape: "The Movie: Gangsta Grillz" (2008) Add It Up Feelin' Myself I'm A Star You Know What It Is Love For Money Photo Shoot Kill The Parking Lot Bachelor Pad Money Tell Smoke Show Me I Live In A TV Top Of The World Shirt Off Search
title: Shirt Off Lyrics | AZLyrics.com
